name: SysNucleus
tag_list: device-driver, usb, windows, system-software, sniffer, usbtrace, usbdeviceshare
overview:
SysNucleus is a leading software development company which has built its solid grounds on the software market since 2005 concentrating mostly on device driver/system products and development tools

Expertise in the following areas:

  • USB
  • Bluetooth
  • NDIS Miniport
  • HID Miniport
  • Virtual Device Drivers
  • Windows File Systems : FAT16/32, NTFS
  • Wireless Sensor Networks (Zigbee)
  • Designs for medical/patient monitoring applications (Including hardware schematics & board design)
  • Embedded product development

Its vision is to develop and innovate system tools, software and solutions which will make the lives of developers and users easy.

SysNucleus,located at Cochin, India, has two premiere products : USBTrace (A software based USB protocol analyzer) and USBDeviceShare. SysNucleus also undertake custom system component development including hardware design.
